summary: This bill, S.612, amends the Native American Tourism and Improving Visitor Experience Act to authorize grant programs. It allows the Bureau of Indian Affairs and the Office of Native Hawaiian Relations to make grants to Indian tribes, tribal organizations, and Native Hawaiian organizations.  Other federal agencies are also authorized to provide grants. The bill authorizes an appropriation of $35 million for the period of fiscal years 2025 through 2029 to fund these programs.
